text:
When using the HTTP PRoxy Server, clikc the Stop button does not. Looking at the code makes the 
reason obvious; the server accept() call blocks the thread so that until another connection is 
made, the stop button has no effect.

The server accept should probably be in its own thread so 
that the stop button can interupt it.
creator: timothyreaves@westfieldgrp.com
